item.title: SSLC results: Yadgir district registers 51.60 pass rate; 64.43 in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Yadgir and Sindhanur taluks have registered the highest pass percentage in both Yadgir and Raichur districts in the SSLC examinations of which the results were announced on Friday.
The Yadgir district secured the 33rd rank in the Stateâ€™s district-wise list with an overall pass percentage of 51.60, as 7,769 students had passed among 15,036 students who appeared for the examination.
In the Yadgir taluk, 5,373 students, including 2,582 boys and 2,791 girls, appeared for the examination, and of th...]]>
